channel.title: [pi] claws fix pleas, and custom item slot help
channel.description:
my claws can hit 4 times with spec on a npc but not a person. how do i fix this? :D
also i gues 3rd age was custom to tragedy pk source wich is the one i have, but when i started out all the 3rd age items went in weapon slot so did the dragon platebvody i fixed all the items besides platebodies and tops i wen to item.java to fix all them by putting in the id's in the right places, and i put in all the top's and platebodie's id's in the platebody spot and put the names of them in the fullbodt spot but they still go in the weapon slot. how do i fix this?

item.title: [pi] claws fix pleas, and custom item slot help
item.dc:creator: @deans1243 deans1243
item.description:
@deans1243 wrote:

my claws can hit 4 times with spec on a npc but not a person. how do i fix this?

also i gues 3rd age was custom to tragedy pk source wich is the one i have, but when i started out all the 3rd age items went in weapon slot so did the dragon platebvody i fixed all the items besides platebodies and tops i wen to item.java to fix all them by putting in the id’s in the right places, and i put in all the top’s and platebodie’s id’s in the platebody spot and put the names of them in the fullbodt spot but they still go in the weapon slot. how do i fix this?
